member.name: M:Nevron.Nov.Internal.pifi.NativeDecodeImageData(System.Byte[],Nevron.Nov.Graphics.NImageFormat)
member.summary: Decodes the specified image data using WPF image decoders.
member.param: The format of the data in the byte array. Cannot be null.
member.returns: Returns a raster that contains the decoded image data. Returns null if the decoding was not successful.

member.name: M:Nevron.Nov.Internal.pifi.NativeEncodeBitmap(Nevron.Nov.Graphics.NRaster)
member.summary: Encodes a raster into BMP image format, using the WPF image encoder.
member.returns: A byte array containing the encoded image data. Returns null if the encoding fails.

member.name: M:Nevron.Nov.Internal.pifi.NativeEncodePng(Nevron.Nov.Graphics.NRaster,Nevron.Nov.Graphics.NPngEncoderSettings)
member.summary: Encodes a raster into PNG image format, using the WPF image encoder.
member.returns: A byte array containing the encoded image data. Returns null if the encoding fails.

member.name: M:Nevron.Nov.Internal.pifi.NativeEncodeJpg(Nevron.Nov.Graphics.NRaster,Nevron.Nov.Graphics.NJpegEncoderSettings)
member.summary: Encodes a raster into JPEG image format, using the WPF image encoder.
member.returns: A byte array containing the encoded image data. Returns null if the encoding fails.

member.name: M:Nevron.Nov.Internal.pifi.NativeEncodeTiff(Nevron.Nov.Graphics.NRaster)
member.summary: Encodes a raster into TIFF image format, using the image encoding capabilities of the underlying platform. Must be implemented in the image service of a platform host.
member.returns: A byte array containing the encoded image data. Returns null if the encoding fails.
